panels.description: This is the global average number of requests performed by the directory service.
panels.title: Overall Load

panels.description: Number of requests in queue waiting to be processed
panels.title: Requests in Queue

panels.description: The recent average of errors occurring in the service. These errors could be tied to client applications, invalid data, authentication failures...
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: The total number of client connections opened against the whole directory service.
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: This value represents the highest latency in receiving messages across all replicas, at each instant.
panels.title: Max Receive Latency

panels.description: Numbers of DS, RS and proxies. Some instances may be combined DS/RS.
panels.title: PingDS instances

targets.expr: sum by (job, instance, ldap_handler, type) (irate(ds_connection_handlers_ldap_requests_seconds_sum{job=~"$ds_job",instance=~"$ds_instance",ldap_handler=~"$ldap_handler"}[1m])) / sum by (job, instance, ldap_handler, type) (irate(ds_connection_handlers_ldap_requests_seconds_count{job=~"$ds_job",instance=~"$ds_instance",ldap_handler=~"$ldap_handler"}[1m]))

panels.description: Time spent for garbage collections by minute

targets.legendFormat: {{job}} {{instance}} G1 young gen collections time m1_rate
{{job}} {{instance}} G1 old gen collections time m1_rate

panels.title: Garbage Collections Time

targets.legendFormat: {{job}} {{instance}} G1 old gen used after GC
{{job}} {{instance}} ZGC old gen used after GC

panels.title: Garbage Collections: old gen memory after GC
